log.input: 1. Screen Settings: Set the canvas width to 700 and height to 400. Do not change the canvas size. 2. Object Motion & Parameter Settings: Create a VPython animation to illustrate the following physics experiment: # **Horizontal projectile, considering gravity and air resistance f = -bv** A small ball is launched horizontally from a height \( h \) with an initial velocity \( v_0 \). The ball accelerates downward under the influence of gravity and bounces upon hitting the ground. Considering both gravity and air resistance \( f = -bv \). Draw the ball and floor. Let the ball move for 6 seconds and then stop. 3. Cyber Input Variable Mapping Information: (1) mass1 is mapped to the variable named mass1 with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional value 5 (2) When the value of mass1 changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated mass1.
log.output:
# Screen Settings
scene.width = 700
scene.height = 400

# Object Motion & Parameter Settings
mass1 = 5
g = 9.81
b = 0.1
h = 10
v0 = 10

floor = box(pos=vector(0,-h,0), size=vector(30,0.1,10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(-15,h,0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)

dt = 0.01
t = 0
while t < 6:
    rate(100)
    F_gravity = mass1 * g
    F_air_resistance = -b * norm(ball.velocity) * mag(ball.velocity)
    F_net = vector(0, -F_gravity, 0) + F_air_resistance
    ball.velocity += F_net / mass1 * dt
    ball.pos += ball.velocity * dt
    if ball.pos.y <= 0:
        ball.pos.y = 0
        ball.velocity.y = -ball.velocity.y
        mass1 = scene.waitfor('click').pos.x
        ball.pos = vector(-15,h,0)
        t = 0
    t += dt

log.input:
Please fix the following error in the program:
Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'norm')

# Object Motion & Parameter Settings
mass1 = 5
g = 9.81
b = 0.1
h = 10
v0 = 10

floor = box(pos=vector(0,-h,0), size=vector(30,0.1,10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(-15,h,0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True, velocity=vector(v0,0,0))

dt = 0.01
t = 0
while t < 6:
    rate(100)
    F_gravity = mass1 * g
    F_air_resistance = -b * norm(ball.velocity) * mag(ball.velocity)
    F_net = vector(0, -F_gravity, 0) + F_air_resistance
    ball.velocity += F_net / mass1 * dt
    ball.pos += ball.velocity * dt
    if ball.pos.y <= 0:
        ball.pos.y = 0
        ball.velocity.y = -ball.velocity.y
        mass1 = scene.waitfor('click').pos.x
        ball.pos = vector(-15,h,0)
        t = 0
    t += dt

# Screen Settings
scene.width = 700
scene.height = 400

# Object Motion & Parameter Settings
mass1 = 5
g = 9.81
b = 0.1
h = 10
v0 = 10

floor = box(pos=vector(0,-h,0), size=vector(30,0.1,10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(-15,h,0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)

dt = 0.01
t = 0
while t < 6:
    rate(100)
    F_gravity = mass1 * g
    ball_velocity_mag = mag(ball.velocity)
    if ball_velocity_mag != 0:
        F_air_resistance = -b * norm(ball.velocity) * ball_velocity_mag
    else:
        F_air_resistance = vector(0,0,0)
    F_net = vector(0, -F_gravity, 0) + F_air_resistance
    ball.velocity += F_net / mass1 * dt
    ball.pos += ball.velocity * dt
    if ball.pos.y <= 0:
        ball.pos.y = 0
        ball.velocity.y = -ball.velocity.y
        mass1 = scene.waitfor('click').pos.x
        ball.pos = vector(-15,h,0)
        t = 0
    t += dt

# Screen Settings
scene.width = 700
scene.height = 400

# Object Motion & Parameter Settings
mass1 = 5
g = 9.81
b = 0.1
h = 10
v0 = 10

floor = box(pos=vector(0,-h,0), size=vector(30,0.1,10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(-15,h,0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True, velocity=vector(0,0,0))

dt = 0.01
t = 0
while t < 6:
    rate(100)
    F_gravity = mass1 * g
    if mag(ball.velocity) != 0:
        F_air_resistance = -b * norm(ball.velocity) * mag(ball.velocity)
    else:
        F_air_resistance = vector(0, 0, 0)
    F_net = vector(0, -F_gravity, 0) + F_air_resistance
    ball.velocity += F_net / mass1 * dt
    ball.pos += ball.velocity * dt
    if ball.pos.y <= 0:
        ball.pos.y = 0
        ball.velocity.y = -ball.velocity.y
        mass1 = scene.waitfor('click').pos.x
        ball.pos = vector(-15,h,0)
        ball.velocity = vector(0,0,0)
        t = 0
    t += dt
